title.narrative: Improving quality of life of the children with mental disability

description.narrative: Msingi ward is in the countryside middle of Tanzania. In the schools or any other public places there were no mentally handicapped children before this project. In Tanzania there are lot of traditional beliefs and prejudices. Human rights of mentally handi capped children do not come true even in the slightest degree. The main aim of this project is to make the lives of mentally handicapped children better by increasing knowledge about handicaps and sharing information to the adults of the area. The aim is a lso to activate the parents of mentally handicapped children to get in touch with other families.The goal is to create at the end of the project a day group or other kinds of activities for mentally handicapped children and their families.The additional fu nding for the third year is asked because there are things that have not been taken into consideration in the original project plan.The beneficiaries are still mentally handicapped children and their families. The indirect beneficiary is the Nguna -Group w hich is a central partner in empowering the families.With the sustainability of the project in mind additional funding is requested for teacher education and to empower the parents group. Also an open seminar will be held to the villagers with local profes sionals. The aim is to provide new forms of action, professional teachers for mentally handicapped children and co-operation between the parents.Msingi ward is in the countryside far away from the other centers of population and so the costs of travelling are high. Because of everything presented above travelling costs are taken into account of the budget of this application.
